CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 23, 1961, page 28, reads: "Baxter Yule Pageant - 'A Mystery for Christmas' is the title of the Christmas pageant which was presented by the fifth and sixth grade pupils at Baxter School, this week. Participants were, left to right: Irene Denson, Janet Parker, Jeannie Dorsey, Marsha Quarles, Linn Washington, the angel Gabriel; Jacqueline Blakey, Juliebeck Washington, Nellie Johnson, Camella Lampkin and Sonya Tyler, (right foreground), who played the part of Mary. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Baxter School 5th and 6th grade students, many in angel costumes, left to right: Irene Denson, Janet Parker, Jeannie Dorsey, Marsha Quarles, Linn Washington, Jacqueline Blakey, Juliebeck Washington, Nellie Johnson, Camella Lampkin, and Sonya Tyler kneeling with baby, enacting nativity scene for a performance of "A Mystery for Christmas," on stage with an inscription on wall reading "...to serve later"
